verses.verse: A Psalm of David; when he changed his behavior before Abimelech, who drove him away, and he departed. I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> at all <S%H6256>times<s%>: His <S%H8416>praise<s%> shall <S%H8548>continually<s%> be in my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall make her <S%H1984>boast<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: The <S%H6035>meek<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8055>thereof<s%>, and be glad.
Oh <S%H1431>magnify<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with <S%H7311>me<s%>, And let us exalt his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.
I <S%H1875>sought<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and he <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H5337>me<s%>, And delivered me from all my <S%H4035>fears<s%>.
They <S%H5027>looked<s%> unto <S%H5102>him<s%>, and were radiant; And their <S%H6440>faces<s%> shall never be <S%H2659>confounded<s%>.
This poor <S%H6041>man<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%>, and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3467>him<s%>, And saved him out of all his <S%H6869>troubles<s%>.
The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2583>encampeth<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H2502>him<s%>, And delivereth them.
Oh <S%H2938>taste<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>: <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> that taketh refuge in <S%H2620>him<s%>.
Oh <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, ye his <S%H6918>saints<s%>; For there is no <S%H4270>want<s%> to them that fear <S%H3373>him<s%>.
The young <S%H3715>lions<s%> do <S%H7326>lack<s%>, and suffer <S%H7456>hunger<s%>; But they that <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall not <S%H2637>want<s%> any good <S%H2896>thing<s%>.
Come <S%H3212><s%>, ye <S%H1121>children<s%>, <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto <S%H3925>me<s%>: I will teach you the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
What <S%H376>man<s%> is he that <S%H2655>desireth<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%>, And <S%H157>loveth<s%> many <S%H3117>days<s%>, that he may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>?
Keep <S%H5341><s%> thy <S%H3956>tongue<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>, And thy <S%H8193>lips<s%> from <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H4820>guile<s%>.
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>; <S%H1245>Seek<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and pursue <S%H7291>it<s%>.
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> are toward the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, And his <S%H241>ears<s%> are open unto their <S%H7775>cry<s%>.
The <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is against them that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>, To cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of them from the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
The righteous <S%H6817>cried<s%>, and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%>, And <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of all their <S%H6869>troubles<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H7138>nigh<s%> unto them that are of a <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, And <S%H3467>saveth<s%> such as are of a <S%H1793>contrite<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>.
Many <S%H7227><s%> are the <S%H7451>afflictions<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> delivereth him out of them <S%H5337>all<s%>.
He <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> all his <S%H6106>bones<s%>: Not <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H2007>them<s%> is <S%H7665>broken<s%>.
Evil <S%H7451><s%> shall <S%H4191>slay<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; And they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H816>condemned<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H6299>redeemeth<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>; And none of them that take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in him shall be <S%H816>condemned<s%>.
